books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: The government hitman Will Robie uncovers a serious threat as he attempts to take out a fellow assassin who has gone rogue.
books.name: THE HIT

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: Odd Thomas, who can communicate with the dead, must forestall a crime by discovering the three innocent people who have been targeted by an evil killer.
books.name: DEEPLY ODD

books.author: by Jessica Sorensen
books.description: When a new tragedy strikes Ella and Micha, one will make a choice that could break them apart forever.
books.name: THE FOREVER OF ELLA AND MICHA

books.author: by Clive Cussler and Graham Brown
books.description: Kurt Austin, Joe Zavala and the rest of the Numa team search for a physicist’s machine, buried in an ocean trench, that can cause deadly earthquakes; the 11th Numa Files novel.
books.name: ZERO HOUR

books.author: by Max Brooks
books.description: An “oral history” of an imagined Zombie War that nearly destroys civilization.
books.name: WORLD WAR Z

books.author: by Sherryl Woods
books.description: With her two sisters heading for the altar, Samantha is finding it hard to ignore her feelings for Ethan, the local war hero.
books.name: SEA GLASS ISLAND

books.author: by John Sandford
books.description: Lucas Davenport is drawn into the investigation of a Minnesota political scandal and the disappearance of an operative.
books.name: SILKEN PREY

books.author: by James Patterson and Maxine Paetro
books.description: A week after giving birth, Detective Lindsay Boxer returns to work to investigate some grisly murders.
books.name: 12TH OF NEVER

books.author: by Georgia Cates
books.description: Will Jack Henry’s absence leave Laurelyn wanting more than her own success? Book 2 of the Beauty series.
books.name: BEAUTY FROM SURRENDER

books.author: by Christine Feehan
books.description: A killer is on the loose in New Orleans, and a sultry jazz singer draws the leopard-shifter Remy Boudreaux deep into the shadows.
books.name: LEOPARD'S PREY

books.author: by Amy Harmon
books.description: A young British teacher takes a tough, troubled and overtly sexy high school senior under his wing.
books.name: A DIFFERENT BLUE

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: A former criminal attorney who has been acquitted of his wife’s murder retreats to his family estate on a rocky New England cliff, where he is comforted by the house’s caretaker amid continuing danger.
books.name: WHISKEY BEACH

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME
